Package com.hexaware.dao

Class PayrollDao

java.lang.Object
com.hexaware.dao.PayrollDao
public class PayrollDao extends Object
The PayrollDao class provides methods to interact with the database for payroll-related operations.

  • Method Details

    • generatePayroll

      public void generatePayroll(Payroll pay)
      Generates a new payroll record in the database.
      Parameters:
      pay - The Payroll object representing the payroll details to be inserted.

    • getPayrollById

      public Payroll getPayrollById(int payrollId) throws PayrollGenerationException
      Retrieves a payroll record by its ID from the database.
      Parameters:
      payrollId - The ID of the payroll to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Payroll object representing the retrieved payroll.
      Throws:
      PayrollGenerationException - If the specified payroll ID is not found in the database.

    • getPayrollsForEmployee

      public List<Payroll> getPayrollsForEmployee(int employeeId) throws PayrollGenerationException, DatabaseConnectionException
      Retrieves all payroll records for a given employee from the database.
      Parameters:
      employeeId - The ID of the employee whose payroll records are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of Payroll objects representing the retrieved payroll records.
      Throws:
      PayrollGenerationException - If no payroll records are found for the specified employee.
      DatabaseConnectionException - If there is an error connecting to the database.

    • getPayrollsForPeriod

      public List<Payroll> getPayrollsForPeriod(LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate) throws DatabaseConnectionException
      Retrieves all payroll records within a specified date range from the database.
      Parameters:
      startDate - The start date of the period.
      endDate - The end date of the period.
      Returns:
      A list of Payroll objects representing the retrieved payroll records.
      Throws:
      DatabaseConnectionException - If there is an error connecting to the database.

    • CalculateGrossSalary

      public float CalculateGrossSalary(int eid)
      Calculates the gross salary for an employee based on their ID.
      Parameters:
      eid - The ID of the employee.
      Returns:
      The calculated gross salary.

    • CalculateNetSalaryAfterDeductions

      public float CalculateNetSalaryAfterDeductions(Payroll pay)
      Calculates the net salary after deductions for a given payroll.
      Parameters:
      pay - The Payroll object representing the payroll for which net salary is to be calculated.
      Returns:
      The calculated net salary after deductions.
